revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Chemin Ardent |image = [[File:Fiery Path.png|300px]] |caption = Une carte du Chemin Ardent. |tokens = 17 000 |location = Nord de Lavandia, est de Vermilava. }} Le '''Chemin Ardent''' est un [[Dungeons/fr|donjon]] de [[Hoenn/fr|Hoenn]]. Il est initialement composé de 49 cases arrangées en 7x7, comprenant 7 coffres, 17 rencontres hors boss et 1 Combat de Boss. Les rencontres sauvages ont 424 000 PV. == Tables des rencontres == === Rencontres sauvages === {| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon sauvages !! colspan=2|Dresseurs |- ! Rencontre !! Dresseur !! Équipe Pokémon |- | [[File:Machop.png|40px]] Machoc || colspan=2 rowspan=5|
N/A |- | [[File:Grimer.png|40px]] Tadmorv |- | [[File:Koffing.png|40px]] Smogo |- | [[File:Slugma.png|40px]] Limagma |- | [[File:Numel.png|40px]] Chamallot |- |} ===Combats de Boss=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon sauvages !! PV de base !! Dresseur Boss !! Équipe Pokémon !! PV de base |- | [[File:Torkoal.png|40px]] Chartor ||
1 200 000 || colspan=3|
— |- |} ==Objets== ===Sans Perte de Bonus===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xAttack}} || N/A || 39.06% || 38.06% || 33.73% |- | {{Bag2|Dowsing Machine}} || N/A || 39.06% || 38.06% || 33.73% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Red Shard}} || N/A || 20.85% || 22.19% || 28.05% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Flame Plate}} || N/A || 0.52% || 0.84% || 2.24% |- | {{Bag2|Draco Plate}} || N/A || 0.52% || 0.84% || 2.24% |}
===Table du taux d'obtention avec Perte de bonus===
After Reaching Kalos, the drop chance for items in Hoenn will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
{| class="wikitable collapsible collapsed" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xAttack}} || N/A || 37.84% || 37.84% || 37.84% |- | {{Bag2|Dowsing Machine}} || N/A || 37.84% || 37.84% || 37.84% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Red Shard}} || N/A || 24.22% || 24.22% || 24.22% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Flame Plate}} || N/A || 0.05% || 0.05% || 0.05% |- | {{Bag2|Draco Plate}} || N/A || 0.05% || 0.05% || 0.05% |}
